subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Arlen Specter, the ranking Republican on the Senate Judiciary Committee, wants to discuss why the N.F.L. destroyed all evidence of the Patriots’ video-taping incident in the season opener.
snippet: Arlen Specter, the ranking Republican on the Senate Judiciary Committee, wants to discuss why the N.F.L. destroyed all evidence of the Patriots’ video-taping incident in the season opener.
